item.title: -----------------------------------------------amFOSS Task-02 Completion-----------------------------
item.description: I faced few issues while setting up Hugo, as it proved to be user-friendly and straightforward. To kickstart, I installed Hugo on my machine using the terminal command ‘sudo apt install hugo’. I then explored various themes on Hugo, experimenting with three before settling on my current one. Honestly, the only real challenge I encountered was choosing the perfect theme. Once I selected the right theme, I created a new site with the ‘hugo create new site’ command and integrated the theme into my directory.

item.title: How to enable table of content ?
item.description: Table of content This theme supports displaying table of content in blog posts. To enable it, globally set toc to true in config.toml: [params] toc = true This will enable table of content for all posts. If you want to enable it for a specific post, add toc = true to the front matter of the post: --- title: How to enable table of content date: 2023-05-02 toc: true ---
